name: Fire Escape (ShainaSenpaii, Benji, Dr_Monkfish, Felmuffin)
description:
Chard is plagued by a jetpack wearing maniac and all attempts at capture have ended in a blaze! Can you slide in and help Max escape his apartment before it's consumed? Solve puzzles, dodge fire, and rescue pets in this flame-filled platform. Don't worry, you won't be alone, Albert the fish will help guide you to safety.

This game was for: WeeklyGameJam / Week: 89 / Theme: Arson

TEAM: Art: ShainaSenpaii / Code: Benji11/ Writer/Narrative: Felmuffin / Audio: Dr_Monkfish
